name: Teleporters
description:
A short difficult puzzlescript game about working with 2 teleporting blocks that move like they are on ice (difficulty and bugs that I couldn't fix may also apply)

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=521ffc26a627584b78affc088aee3f11

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=521ffc26a627584b78affc088aee3f11
